drop_files_desc: Drag & drop PDF files here or use the buttons above
language_description: Select your interface language. Changes will be applied immediately.
appearance_description: Customize app appearance, bar position and background settings.
selection_color_desc: Personalize text selection and AI send button color.
models_description: You can turn on/off the AI models you want to use. At least one model must be active.
selectors_description: AI site selectors you defined with the element picker are listed here. Green indicator means a custom selector is defined for that site.
no_selectors_hint: Use the Magic Picker in the AI webview to define custom selectors.
drop_pdf_here: Drop PDF here or click to select
error_corrupt_file: PDF file is corrupt or invalid
error_pdf_load: Failed to load PDF. Please try again.
error_send_failed: Failed to send text. Make sure AI page is loaded.
error_input_not_found: AI input field not found. Try reloading the page.
error_focus_script_failed: Failed to focus AI input field
error_focus_failed: Could not focus on the input field
error_script_failed: Failed to input text into AI
webview_crashed_max: Page keeps crashing. Please restart the app.
show_only_icons_desc: Hide text labels, show only icons.
picker_intro_text: Find the text box where you type your questions or messages and click on it. This teaches the system where to write.
picker_typing_text: If the 'Send' button is hidden, type a single letter into the box to make it appear. If it's already there, you can proceed.
picker_submit_text: Click on the button (usually an arrow or plane icon) that you click to send your message.
picker_hint_input_correct: Perfect! This is the text input area. Correct choice.
picker_hint_submit_correct: Great! This looks like a send button. Correct choice.
picker_hint_button_send: This is a clickable button - Looks correct for sending!
picker_hint_div_input: This is an area used for text input. Correct choice.
picker_hint_textarea_perfect: Bullseye! This is the main text box. Perfect choice.
picker_hint_generic_box: This is too generic. Please focus on where you directly type or click.
picker_hint_icon: You clicked just the icon. Please click the button itself that contains this icon!
picker_hint_text: You clicked just text. Please click the button or box containing it.
picker_hint_form: You selected the whole form. Please click only the input field inside it.
picker_hint_clickable: This area looks clickable, might be correct.
bar_drag_hint: Drag to reposition the menu button
bg_random_mode_desc: Blobs will change to random beautiful colors autonomously.
confirm_delete_all_selectors: Are you sure you want to delete all selectors?
picker_started_hint: Element Picker Mode Started. Please click on the Input and then the Send button in order.
toast_invalid_folder_name: You entered an invalid folder name
usage_assistant_desc: Starts the interactive tour showing how to use the application.
ua_step1_text: Open the menu to start using the application.
ua_step2_text: Settings and tools are on the left, AI models are on the right.
ua_step3_text: Use this tool to select the input field on the page to send text to AI models.
ua_step4_text: Use this button to swap the positions of the left and right panels.
ua_step5_text: You can customize background colors, bar opacity, and other visual settings from the 'Settings' menu.
tut_welcome_desc: Learn how to teach the AI to control websites. Click "Start" to begin.
tut_select_input_desc: Hover over the input box below and CLICK to select it. This tells the AI where to type.
tut_type_msg_desc: Now act like a user. Type "hello" in the box to reveal the send button.
tut_select_btn_desc: The send button is now visible. Hover and CLICK it to teach the AI how to send.
tut_success_desc: Excellent! You have successfully mapped the input and send button.
tut_disclaimer: ChatGPT can make mistakes. Check important info.
tut_example_site_desc: How can I help you today?
tutorial_button_desc: Learn how to use the Magic Selector with a guided simulation.
selectors_description_simple: View and manage custom selectors for your AI models. Selectors allow the app to automatically input text and buttons.
name: Name
confirm_delete_selectors: Are you sure you want to delete selectors for this AI?
